scripts.version:patch: pnpm version patch -m "chore: release v%s" && pnpm --filter electron-app version patch --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:minor: pnpm version minor -m "chore: release v%s" && pnpm --filter electron-app version minor --no-git-tag-version
scripts.version:major: pnpm version major -m "chore: release v%s" && pnpm --filter electron-app version major --no-git-tag-version
